cmp: 几 (small table, almost, a few/how many, how much/how many/several/a few)
mng: to draw a bow to the full, the range of a bow and arrow, old variant of 夠|够[gou4], enough

exm.mng: able to do sth, in a position to do sth, same as 能夠|能够
within the range of a bow and arrow, (fig.) under sb's control
